sqlMap.sql: SHA.REGISTER_DT < add_months(sysdate, -14)
TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA
dual
( select IVE.SHIPPER_CD ,IVE.INVOICE_NO ,IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA ,TT_INVOICE IVE where IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and () )
TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA ,TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_PLTZ PLT
TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA ,TT_INVOICE IVE
IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and PLT.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and PLT.INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and PLT.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and ()
TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA ,TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_PLTZ PLT ,TT_PLTZ_ITEM PIT

IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and PLT.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and PLT.INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and PLT.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and PIT.MAIN_MARK = PLT.MAIN_MARK and ()

( select IVR.SHIPPER_CD ,IVR.INVOICE_NO ,IVR.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA ,TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_INVOICE IVR where IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and () )

( select IVF.SHIPPER_CD ,IVF.INVOICE_NO ,IVF.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA ,TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_INVOICE IVF where IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and IVF.PAR_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVF.PAR_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVF.PAR_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVF.INVOICE_CLASS = 'F' and () )
IVC.CANCEL_TYP = 'C' and IVC.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < add_months(sysdate, -14)
( select IVC.SHIPPER_CD ,IVC.INVOICE_NO ,IVC.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVC where () )

( select IVE.SHIPPER_CD ,IVE.INVOICE_NO ,IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVC ,TT_INVOICE IVE where IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and () )

( select IVR.SHIPPER_CD ,IVR.INVOICE_NO ,IVR.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVC ,TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_INVOICE IVR where IVE.SHIPPER_CD = IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and () )

( select IVF.SHIPPER_CD ,IVF.INVOICE_NO ,IVF.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVC ,TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_INVOICE IVF where IVE.SHIPPER_CD = IVF.PAR_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = IVF.PAR_INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVF.PAR_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVF.INVOICE_CLASS = 'F' and () )

( select IVR.SHIPPER_CD ,IVR.INVOICE_NO ,IVR.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVC ,TT_INVOICE IVR where IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD and IVC.INVOICE_NO = IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_NO and IVC.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and () )

( select IVF.SHIPPER_CD ,IVF.INVOICE_NO ,IVF.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVC ,TT_INVOICE IVF where IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVF.PAR_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD and IVC.INVOICE_NO = IVF.PAR_INVOICE_NO and IVC.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVF.PAR_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVF.INVOICE_CLASS = 'F' and () )
IVE.MANUAL_FLG = 'Y' and IVE.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < add_months(sysdate, -14)
( select IVE.SHIPPER_CD ,IVE.INVOICE_NO ,IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVE where () )

( select IVR.SHIPPER_CD ,IVR.INVOICE_NO ,IVR.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_INVOICE IVR where IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVR.RELATE_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and () )

( select IVF.SHIPPER_CD ,IVF.INVOICE_NO ,IVF.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT from TT_INVOICE IVE ,TT_INVOICE IVF where IVF.PAR_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVF.PAR_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVF.PAR_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVF.INVOICE_CLASS = 'F' and () )
TT_SHIPPING_DOCUMENT SHD
SHD.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and SHD.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and SHD.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and FLM.FILE_ID = SHD.FILE_ID
DUAL
SHD.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and SHD.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and SHD.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT
dual
PAN.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and PAN.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and PAN.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT
dual
PAC.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and PAC.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and PAC.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT
TT_PACKING_HEAD PKH
PKH.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and PKH.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and PKH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and FLM.FILE_ID = PKH.FILE_ID
dual
PKH.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and PKH.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and PKH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT
dual
IVA.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and IVA.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and IVA.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT
TT_INVOICE_HEADER IVH
IVH.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and IVH.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and IVH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and FLM.FILE_ID = IVH.FILE_ID
dual
IVH.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and IVH.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and IVH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT
IVE.SHIPPER_CD = IV_.SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = IV_.INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IV_.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT

delete from TT_EXP_RCV_ODR ERO /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.deleteTtExpRcvOdrShiped */ where ERO.ETD_DUE_DT < add_months(sysdate, -14) and ERO.ODR_FIRM_FLG = 'Y' and ERO.ODR_QTY = ERO.SHIPPED_QTY and not exists ( select * from TT_MIXTAG_ODR MXO where MXO.RCV_ODR_COMP_CD = ERO.RCV_ODR_COMP_CD and MXO.CUSTOMER_CD = ERO.CUSTOMER_CD and MXO.LGCY_SHIP_TO = ERO.LGCY_SHIP_TO and MXO.ITEM_NO = ERO.ITEM_NO and MXO.PKG_CD = ERO.PKG_CD and MXO.TRNS_CD = ERO.TRNS_CD and MXO.ETD_DUE_DT = ERO.ETD_DUE_DT and MXO.CUSTOMER_PO_NO = ERO.CUSTOMER_PO_NO and MXO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO = ERO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO and MXO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO_ORG = ERO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO_ORG and MXO.ODR_CTRL_NO = ERO.ODR_CTRL_NO ) and not exists ( select * from TT_PLTZ_INSTR_ODR PLO where PLO.RCV_ODR_COMP_CD = ERO.RCV_ODR_COMP_CD and PLO.CUSTOMER_CD = ERO.CUSTOMER_CD and PLO.LGCY_SHIP_TO = ERO.LGCY_SHIP_TO and PLO.ITEM_NO = ERO.ITEM_NO and PLO.PKG_CD = ERO.PKG_CD and PLO.TRNS_CD = ERO.TRNS_CD and PLO.ETD_DUE_DT = ERO.ETD_DUE_DT and PLO.CUSTOMER_PO_NO = ERO.CUSTOMER_PO_NO and PLO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO = ERO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO and PLO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO_ORG = ERO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO_ORG and PLO.ODR_CTRL_NO = ERO.ODR_CTRL_NO ) and not exists ( select * from TT_PLTZ_ITEM_ODR PIO where PIO.RCV_ODR_COMP_CD = ERO.RCV_ODR_COMP_CD and PIO.CUSTOMER_CD = ERO.CUSTOMER_CD and PIO.LGCY_SHIP_TO = ERO.LGCY_SHIP_TO and PIO.ITEM_NO = ERO.ITEM_NO and PIO.PKG_CD = ERO.PKG_CD and PIO.TRNS_CD = ERO.TRNS_CD and PIO.ETD_DUE_DT = ERO.ETD_DUE_DT and PIO.CUSTOMER_PO_NO = ERO.CUSTOMER_PO_NO and PIO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO = ERO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO and PIO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO_ORG = ERO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO_ORG and PIO.ODR_CTRL_NO = ERO.ODR_CTRL_NO )

delete from TT_CML_ERROR_DTL CED /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.deleteTtCmlErrorDtl */ where exists ( select * from TT_CML_ERROR_HEADER CEH where CED.DSC_ID = CEH.DSC_ID and CED.ERR_CREATE_TIMESTAMP = CEH.ERR_CREATE_TIMESTAMP and CEH.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < trunc(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'MM') )
delete from TT_CML_ERROR_HEADER CEH /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.deleteTtCmlErrorHeader */ where CEH.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < trunc(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'MM')

delete from TT_BHT_WORK_PLTZ BWP /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.deleteTtBhtWorkPltz */ where exists ( select * from TT_BHT_WORK_TIME BWT where BWP.WORK_TIME_NO = BWT.WORK_TIME_NO and BWT.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < add_months(sysdate, -14) )

delete from TT_BHT_WORK_MIX_TAG BWM /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.deleteTtBhtWorkMixTag */ where exists ( select * from TT_BHT_WORK_TIME BWT where BWM.WORK_TIME_NO = BWT.WORK_TIME_NO and BWT.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < add_months(sysdate, -14) )

delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteTtScAttachedByMain */ from TT_SC_ATTACHED SCA where exists ( select 'X' from TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA , TT_INVOICE IVE where
and SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and IVE.SHIPPER_CD = SCA.SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = SCA.INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = SCA.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT )

delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteLbFileManagerScByMain */ from LB_FILE_MANAGER FLM where exists ( select 'X' from TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA , TT_INVOICE IVE , TT_SC_HEADER SCH where
and SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and IVE.SHIPPER_CD = SCH.SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = SCH.INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = SCH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and SCH.FILE_ID = FLM.FILE_ID )

delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteTtScHeaderByMain */ from TT_SC_HEADER SCH where exists ( select 'X' from TT_SHIPPING_ACT SHA , TT_INVOICE IVE where
and SHA.SHIPPING_ACT_NO = IVE.SHIPPING_ACT_NO and IVE.SHIPPER_CD = SCH.SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = SCH.INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = SCH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT )

delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteTtScAttachedByBeforeCancel */ from TT_SC_ATTACHED SCA where exists ( select 'X' from TT_INVOICE IVC , TT_INVOICE IVE where
and IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVE.SHIPPER_CD = SCA.SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = SCA.INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = SCA.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT )

delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteLbFileManagerScByBeforeCancel */ from LB_FILE_MANAGER FLM where exists ( select 'X' from TT_INVOICE IVC , TT_INVOICE IVE , TT_SC_HEADER SCH where
and IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVE.SHIPPER_CD = SCH.SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = SCH.INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = SCH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and SCH.FILE_ID = FLM.FILE_ID )

delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteTtScHeaderByBeforeCancel */ from TT_SC_HEADER SCH where exists ( select 'X' from TT_INVOICE IVC , TT_INVOICE IVE where
and IVC.SHIPPER_CD = IVE.SHIPPER_CD and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_NO = IVE.INVOICE_NO and IVC.CANCEL_INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT and IVE.SHIPPER_CD = SCH.SHIPPER_CD and IVE.INVOICE_NO = SCH.INVOICE_NO and IVE.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT = SCH.INVOICE_ISSUE_DT )

delete from /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteLbFileManagerByOdrUpload */ LB_FILE_MANAGER FLM where exists ( select 'X' from TT_ODR_UPLOAD_REQ_MGT OUP where OUP.COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < add_months(sysdate, -14) and ( OUP.UPLOAD_FILE_ID = FLM.FILE_ID or OUP.ERR_FILE_ID = FLM.FILE_ID ) )
delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteTtOdrUploadReqMgt */ from TT_ODR_UPLOAD_REQ_MGT where COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < add_months(sysdate, -14)
delete /* SqlMap-BatchDelete.DeleteTtOnlineReqJobParam */ from TT_ONLINE_REQ_JOB_PARAM where COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP < trunc(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'MM')
